title: (27800) Vilalba - 7 Rúa Benxamín Paz
description: Laundry with three washing machines and three dryers (20kg 15min) Very clean place. The manager even cleaned up while we were there. Clothes come out smelling nice from the washer and not too wrinkled from the dryer. It has WiFi, a couple of plugs, four boxes with keys to charge the mobile and a children's area.

title: (27800) Villalba - 36 Avenida da Terra Cha
description: Automatic laundry

title: (27810) Vilalba - 56 Avenida Tierra Llana
description: Area of motorhomes in Villalba.

title: (27820) Vilalba - 15 LU-P-6515
description: Quiet area, no services but bar and indoor and outdoor pools, picnic area, fairly flat area next to the indoor pool and football field, good place to spend the night

title: (27820) Vilalba - Estrada Praia Fluvial
description: Before getting into the village because traffic is complicated for a motorhome. In a quiet street despite a fairly busy bar. For a night stop.

title: (27820) Vilalba - 15 Lugar Magdalena
description: Parking between the soccer field and the Vilalba indoor swimming pool. Quiet, spacious and flat terrain. Has some lighting at night. 1 minute from the main car park, so all services are available. No height or length restrictions. Significantly quieter than the main parking lot of the river outdoor pool.

title: (27810) Vilalba - 33 Carretera do Barral
description: Parking behind the church and next to the cemetery. Calm, but slightly sloping. That didn't stop us from spending a carefree night there.

title: (27816) Vilalba - 109 Rúa da Cerdeira
description: Pure and hard industrial estate. No services. It's fine to spend a night and rest. Little noise at night. It has a small garden area to stretch your legs. There is no signage prohibiting overnight stays. Close to the highway exit.

title: (27813) Villalba - 29 N-634
description: It is a bar-restaurant that has a shower if you consume. Good deal and clean.

title: (27825) Vilalba - Unnamed Road
description: This is a parking lot for the Charca mineral springs public pool. Its flat. Quiet. Has toilets.. The mineral springs are free to swim in and very healthy. Temp around 23 degrees C.

title: (27844) Vilalba - 63 N-634
description: Former shed disused large vacant lot, shady and stable even if it rains ...... Possibility of having no vis-à-vis .....

title: (27844) Martiñán - N-634
description: There is water at the gas station.

title: (27377) A Feira do Monte - 13 Rúa de Rosalía de Castro
title_short: (27377) A Feira do Monte - 13 Rúa de Rosalía de Castro
description: Area of motorhomes in Feira Do Monte, Cospeito. Very quiet area to spend a few days surrounded by nature and get to know lar beautiful natural lakes of the place.

title: (27372) Begonte - Unnamed Road
description: Parking space on a secluded, beautiful quarry pond. Just a really level parking space. Otherwise space for approx. 3 vehicles.

title: (27845) Abadín - Unnamed Road
description: Place to make a small stop to rest or eat something. Access from N-634. In the middle of a forest. Well passable gravel tracks. There are several areas to stop. Before next to the road, panaderia mariñan (to buy empanadas, loaves of bread.

title: (27371) Begonte - 16-19 Travesía Daniel Chaver Gómez
description: Begonte River Club. Ideal place to spend the day surrounded by nature and very quiet. There is plenty of shade and tables to eat. In addition, in the river there is an area suitable for swimming. It's privately owned (the owner is very friendly) so it's worth paying that fee when you see places as well maintained and beautiful as this. It has restrooms and drinking fountains.

title: (27835) Xermade - AG-64
description: Rest stop on Freeway. Large, flat, plenty of space. Might be noisy at night but easy stop for a rest.

title: (27836) Muras - Unnamed Road
description: Very isolated place on a path which must be quite muddy in case of rain, but there is also a clearance at the edge of the tarmac road (narrow). Van only in my opinion. River not accessible but water flows over the road.

name: Camping Lugo
title: (27305) Camping Lugo
description: Very nice place to stay, near the main A-6 and on the way to Santiago de Compostela. Very friendly with a small bar on site and the toilets and showers are super clean. Although next to the main road, it is quiet as the highway is nearby. There is water and electricity at all pitches.

title: (27738) Abadín - 3 Praza Campo da Feira
description: Flat parking with about 18 large spaces. Very quiet place in the middle of the town. No shadows. Clean bathrooms open to the public, free of charge. Water intake behind the bathrooms.

title: (27738) Abadín - 33 LU-P-0101
description: Small river beach near a calm town with a playground for kids, 6 picnic tables and a tennis court.

title: (27738) Abadín - 1 Lugar Carballinos
description: Water point on the Camino with good cold drinking water

title: () Feira -
description: Perfect place to be and sleep. Super quiet and with some huge stones. Routes start from here, beautiful forest.

title: (27380) Guitiriz - 20 Calle Campo Feira
description: A Carballeira recreational area parking. Site recommended by the inhabitants of the town Pobra do Parga. Very nice and quiet place. From here starts a path along the river of about 7 km.

title: (27370) Rábade - 40 LU-107
description: Very clean laundromat Free Wifi Exchange of banknotes for coins Sockets to connect the telephone...

title: (27370) Rábade - 1 Avenida de Vilalba
description: Rábade Self-service Laundry. Wash and dry your clothes.

title: (27377) Cospeito - 53 LU-113
description: Simple shady parking and along the river a few kilometers from Lugo. Accessible to vehicles of all sizes.

title: (27300) Guitiriz - CP-23-04
description: Beautiful place in nature with a natural swimming pool and a beautiful trail along the creek with historic mill buildings. Great for families with children. Certainly you can also stand here overnight but you also come here on the trail from the free Womo parking lot from here

title: (27300) Guitiriz - 1 Lugar Sesulfe
description: Small ideal place for a picnic in nature ...

name: Área Camper Guitiriz
title: (27300) Área Camper Guitiriz
description: Parking and emptying area with park for children, water. There is a gas station nearby, supermarket and bars.

title: (15320) As Pontes de García Rodríguez - 3 Poblado da Fraga
title_short: (15320) As Pontes de García Rodríguez - 3 Poblado da Fraga
description: Green area on the bank of the River, a lot of flat parking but little shade in summer. Is very pretty

title: (27377) - Unnamed Road
description:
Playa fluvial: Flat parking in pretty location by the river, swimming encouraged, very tranquil. Picnic tables, shelter, toilets, drinking water, and outdoor shower.

Note there will be an arts and music Festa Pozomouro (festival) here on 19 Aug 2023, camping and parking in adjacent fields. So don't come this weekend if you want the usual peace and tranquility of this place! There are activities and events all day from 11am with 3 bands (Balkan, Celtic, Cumbria )starting at 9.30pm then a DJ until .......

title: (27300) Guitiriz - 66 Rúa do Concello
description:
Wash-up, served as a car wash also with the option to leave (or have it picked up at the AC) the laundry and collect it or have it delivered to where you are ready without having to wait.
Large room with children's area, sofas and wifi.
Also with laundry service.

title: (27300) Cabanacomba -
description:
Nice and quiet place in the middle of nature (very deserted!), located on a reservoir! enough space! We were there with a campervan! Free! Please take your rubbish with you or put it in the rubbish bin provided!
Along the path comes a fresh water source with excellent water.

title: (27837) Muras - 22 Viveiro
description: Quiet place, the area is fenced, you enter without problems, always leave the portal closed, this is all very well

title: (15320) As Pontes de García Rodríguez - 44 Avenida Ortigueira
title_short: (15320) As Pontes de García Rodríguez - 44 Avenida Ortigueira
description:
Pet car wash with shampoo available, pet laundry, and vending machine with pipettes, leashes, etc.
Collection point for Amazon items.
Clothes laundry and coffee machine.
Thanks to As Pontes for these well-cared, new and complete services.

title: (27300) Guitiriz - 94 Avenida da Coruña
description: Parking in the center of the city. Without any services, to get to know the town or sleep in passing.

title: (15328) As Pontes de García Rodríguez - 29 Rúa Rego do Muiño
title_short: (15328) As Pontes de García Rodríguez - 29 Rúa Rego do Muiño
description: Self-service laundry. New machines and everything very clean. Good price and service.

title_short: (15320) As Pontes de García Rodríguez - 12 Rúa Juan Antonio Suances
description: Public space for motorhomes, a service for filling, emptying and reserved parking

title: (27738) Abadín - 10 Lugar Someiro
description: Small resting place next to the highway and gas station

title: (27150) Outeiro de Rei - Rúa E
description: Service station with shower for a fee. It is a 24h service area with restaurant and menu widely used by truckers. You do not have services for campers

title: (27738) Lugo - 18 Rua Xesta
description: Showers at repsol gas station. It is allowed to use the shower if consumption is made at the gas station or restaurant and with the condition of mopping after use. brilliant!!!

title: (15320) As Pontes de García Rodríguez - 110 Rúa Antonio Machado
title_short: (15320) As Pontes de García Rodríguez - 110 Rúa Antonio Machado
description: Ugly but wide esplanade and very close to the motorhome area for the days of the flea market that cannot be in the area. from here there is a walk to get to the swamp. very good mobile coverage.

title: (27260) Castro de Ribeiras - Parque Empresarial
description: Gas station the cheapest fuel in the province to highlight from this review each pump has a tap to take DRINKING WATER

title: (15328) As Pontes de García Rodríguez - 25 Rúa Blanco Amor
title_short: (15328) As Pontes de García Rodríguez - 25 Rúa Blanco Amor
description: Motorhome service area. Loading and unloading of clean and gray water, toilet discharge.

name: CASTRO RIBEIRAS
title: (27260) CASTRO RIBEIRAS
description: Motorhome area.

title: (15320) As Pontes de García Rodríguez - AC-101
title_short: (15320) As Pontes de García Rodríguez - AC-101
description: Spectacular location overlooking the lagoon. Location with easy access and level ground. Closed from 24:00 to 08:00.

name: Outeiro de Rei Motorhome Area
title: (27150) Outeiro de Rei Motorhome Area
description: A very quiet area with all services; electricity, water and drainage. The location is confusing because the GPS directs you to a recreational area. (Sta Isabel) You have to follow the GPS indications until you reach an urbanization of chalets and when you get to a Red one you have to turn left, on the right side of that chalets, at the end of that street is the caravan area.

title: (27269) Castro de Rei - 56 Avenida Terra Chá
title_short: (27269) Castro de Rei - 56 Avenida Terra Chá
description: Laundry with hours from 7 a.m. to 11 p.m. from Monday to Sunday, 5 minutes walk from the motorhome area.

title: () As Pontes de García Rodríguez - Unnamed Road
title_short: () As Pontes de García Rodríguez - Unnamed Road
description: Plenty of parking spaces along the road leading to the lake. Many benches along the beach, it's super quiet. The view is beautiful. There is the possibility of doing water sports - style windsurfing and canoeing. The site closed at 11 p.m.

title: (27150) Santa Isabel - 3 Barro Santa Isabel
description: You have to pay 10 euros for parking. I asked the guy and he told me that only July and August and from Thursday to Sunday. the other days you can be without paying

title: (15325) As Pontes de García Rodríguez - 13 Lugar Couce
title_short: (15325) As Pontes de García Rodríguez - 13 Lugar Couce
description: The car park is a soccer field, located in the middle of a quiet village with minimal noise at night. Next to it is a shed with water and some tables with benches. It also has a bar just 50 meters away (check Casa Picos opening hours). We have asked the neighbors if we could stay and we have not had any problems.

title: (27309) Guitiriz - Autovía del Noroeste
description: Wide service area. The bar closes from 24:00 to 6:15am. Perfect for resting one night and continuing your journey. Lots of trucks. At the foot of the highway. There is gas station.

title: (27300) Guitiriz - Pk 538 Autovía del Noroeste
description: Motorway area in the direction of Lugo / Madrid which offers the same services as the area opposite in the direction of A Coruña. Possibility of crossing the motorway on foot by a footbridge to get from one area to another. Quiet enough to spend the night and above all good free hot shower. Having no waste water reserve (small converted van), I did not notice if it was possible to empty the dirty water. On the other hand, the cafeteria is overpriced for Spain.

title: (27250) Castro de Rei - 63 Rua Alcalde Emilio Sinde Neito
title_short: (27250) Castro de Rei - 63 Rua Alcalde Emilio Sinde Neito
description: Castro de Rei is an essential town to visit. It has a river beach, old town, playground and a beautiful 7km route parallel to the Azúmara river, which reaches an ancient Celtic town called Castro de Viladonga. In the Plaza Mayor there is a fortnightly fair on Sundays and we find fruit, vegetables, tools, textiles and authentic octopus cooked in the Galician style. The Plaza Mayor is the nerve center of the town. Free services in the area, somewhat steep entrance, be very careful with the ground floor. Enchanting place.

title: (27154) Outeiro de Rei - Unnamed Road
description: Ideal parking for hiking next to the river Miño and also to enjoy the Zoo.

title: (15619) Guitiriz -
description: Enjoy the ocean view, wind and fresh cow dung. Flat parking for 2 vans. Access by well maintained gravelroad.

title: (27246) Pastoriza - Unnamed Road
description: Recreational area A riboira. Recreation area with tables, barbecues ... located on the banks of the river Miño in a quiet setting with native riverside vegetation. In addition to having a river beach.

title: (27153) San Clodio - Unnamed Road
description:
Small parking lot in the City of Ants.
Beautiful and fun walk through this great wonder. Worth visiting.

title: (27748) Mondoñedo - 6 Lugar Supena
description: Parking in front of a picnic area with beautiful views of the valley. Next to a road that no one travels on. Level ground. The best Park4night you will find near Mondoñedo.

title: (27299) Lugo - 1 Lugar Bandelo
description: Active tourism in rural areas

title: (15317) Aranga - Unnamed Road
description: In the countryside not far from the small village of Aranga. Tables including a large covered and 2 barbecues in hard as well as bins. 2 hiking or biking nearby. Perfect for a quiet break away from the coast. Possibility of bathing.

title: (15325) As Pontes de García Rodríguez - 8 Carretera de Pontedeume as Pontes
title_short: (15325) As Pontes de García Rodríguez - 8 Carretera de Pontedeume as Pontes
description: Paved and flat car park for the village church, with a fountain, two sheds and one with a table and barbecue. Quiet place.

title: (27740) Mondoñedo - 9 Rúa Vicedo
description: Motorhome area in Mondoñedo. It is a large parking lot with the possibility of water change, both gray and black. It also has a tap for drinking water with a wire and a container. We didn't sleep but it looks very quiet and surrounded by shops.

title: (27740) Mondoñedo - 7 Camino da Valada
description: Mondonedo. Very calm parking close to a hostel (for pilgrims) at the Santiago trail. Surrounded by nature, nice smell of herbs. Entering street limited to 3500 kg vans with 7m length. Nice traditional restaurant close (A’ Tasca)

title: (27740) Mondoñedo - 15 Rúa Leiras Pulpeiro
description: drinking fountain

title: (27740) Mondoñedo - 1 Rúa Pacheco
description: Laundry room with washer and dryer. Service until 23:00

title: (15619) Monfero - Carretera Vnu
description: Space right after a curve for more than 15 campers. Between trees. Space should be used to make wood by the locals. Quiet and peaceful

title: (15619) Monfero - 1 Lugar Convento
description: Parking of the information house of the natural park, and next to the monastery of Santa María de Monfero. In the information house they told us that we could spend the night, very quiet area.

title: (27286) Pastoriza - 6 Avenida do Iryda
description: Esplanade next to the social center ideal for spending the night. Very calm. There is a tap for drinking water, a playground for children and a grassy field for games. Nearby there are supermarkets and bakery.

title: (27865) Ourol - 1 Ourol
description: Motorhome area in the town of Ourol. Next to recreation area with picnic tables, children's play area and town swimming pool. Lit overnight. No height restrictions. Parking is sloped - chocks required. Free electricity (shuko plug).

title: (15617) Monfero - Unnamed Road
description: Flat space in the middle of nature. I agreed with my T4, but I would only recommend it for 4x4.

title: (27297) Lugo - 1 Rúa dos Carros
description: Parking with scale for weighing your motorhome

title: (27777) O Valadouro - Unnamed Road
description: Easy access although it would not hurt to prune on both sides of the road, beautiful and quiet place to spend the night, during the day it has splendid views, where you park is countryside, pure nature, there are tables and a grill, you can do a hiking route to see, a dolmen, field of chantas, Tórez waterfall

title: (27297) Lugo - Carretera de Lugo
description: AS Termas shopping center, ample parking to quietly buy and fill the pantry, as well as continuous buses that take you to the city center.

title: (27747) O Vilar -
description: Access by a dirt track.

title: (27226) Friol - LU-233
description:
Large and level esplanade next to the municipal market of Friol (Lugo). A 5-minute walk from the town, where all kinds of services are found. River walk and Roman castro (O Friulio) very close.
We spent the night on a Saturday night alone and very quiet; there was no market on Sunday, but it may be noisier and busier any other day of the week.

title: (27220) Friol - 135 Calle Castelos
description:
Farm with almost 1 Ha. of meadow and more than 2,000m2 of forest. 1 km from the town center, in a very quiet area, with no houses around.
In Friol there are all kinds of basic services, a beautiful river promenade and a magnificent public swimming pool (€3).
Nearby places of interest:
Torre S. Paio de Narla: 10 min
Roman Temple of Vault: 15 min
Sobrado dos Monxes Monastery: 20 min
Lugo: 20 min
A Coruña: 1 hour
Santiago: 1 hour
Beaches: 1 hour
O Courel and Os Ancares mountains: 1h 30min
A beautiful hiking route passes through Friol, linking in 2 stages the primitive way to Santiago, in Lugo, with the north way, in Sobrado dos Monxes. It is marked with a green arrow and you can find the track on Wikiloc.

title: (27220) Friol - 1 Praza Andón Cebreiro
description: Parking in the main town square. Supermarket across the street. Bank at 30 meters. Civil Guard 50 meters. Restaurants. Hardware store. Beautiful river passage a hundred meters. You could also park

title: (27297) Lugo - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful area near the fortnightly town of Lugo. Good shade and pretty scenery. Possibilities of mountain biking and hiking.

title: (27296) Lugo - 14 Avenida Marques de Ombreiro
description: Quiet, green area, with shade, and with space to play children and dogs (it has 2 soccer fields). There are 2 or 3 picnic tables. There is no service. If you have a vehicle taller than 3 meters, watch out for the trees.

title: (15317) Aranga - 42 Carretera Villar
description: Attached to the A-6 motorway, it is a gravel parking lot, the Tizón bar parking lot. Wide, dark, no prohibition sign.

name: Camping Fragadeume
title: (15617) Camping Fragadeume
description: Camping Fragadeume at the doors of the Natural Park "Fragas do Eume".

title: (27297) Adai - 7 Lugar Adai
description: Quiet picnic area surrounded by nature. There is a very large stone table that lacks a bench, a good tree that provides shade in the morning and at noon, it is next to the road.

title: (27297) Lugo - Avenida Infanta Elena
description: Motorhome area

title: (27240) Lugo - 2A Camiño Escuelas
description:
Very clean and new! Be disposal TOP
nice park right next door with fitness equipment and playground.

title: (27270) Mosteiro - 35 Camino de Cadeite
description: Service area for motorhomes in MOSTEIRO POL Lugo.

title: (27775) San Pedro de Mor - 20 CP-0202
description: Alfoz service area, with ample parking and located next to Campo de Fútbol a very quiet town, ideal for hiking and 25 km from the beach

title: (27297) Lugo - 22 Rua Río Sil

title: (27003) Lugo - 12 Rúa Alta
description: Parking at a commercial station, no explicit restriction, suitable only for vehicles of 6m or less (personal judgment)

title: (27004) Lugo - 1 LU-P-2902
description: Self-service laundry.

title: (15815) Casal de Abaixo - 3 Lugar Casal Abaixo
title_short: (15815) Casal de Abaixo - 3 Lugar Casal Abaixo
description: Parking house do queixo. Very good place to do the activity of visit and they allow you to spend the night in their parking lot. farm visit activity and cheese workshop. I recommend for families with children.

title: (27001) Lugo - Rúa Ánxel Fole
description: Paid parking downtown with 8 seats reserved for CC. not seen services.

title: (15565) As Somozas - 37 Igrexa
description: Public fountain

title: (15565) As Somozas - 64 Rúa das Oliveiras
description: As Somozas is located at the eastern end of the province of A Coruña, which belongs to the comarca of Ferrol. The A Queiroga Recreation Area, on the banks of the Mera, is an appropriate spot for trout fishing and is also frequented by people looking to enjoy nature.

name: Área de autocaravanas fragas del Eume
title: (15617) Área de autocaravanas fragas del Eume
title_short: (15617) Área de autocaravanas fragas del Eume
description:
EUME FRAGAS PRIVATE AREA


Private motorhome area where you can enjoy the tranquility of the mountain.


- SERVICES: 12 places with electricity, 20 places without electricity, 10 showers, washing machine/dryer, water emptying and filling area, dining room with sink, microwave, fridge, tables. .. , vending machine for drinks and snacks where you can also change clothes, picnic areas with barbecue, children's play area, swimming pool...
Baker, meats for barbecue, charcoal, there is a supermarket 1.5 km away for small purchases (Ponte da Pedra cooperative)

We have marked hiking routes that start from the same area, 4x4 excursions through the Fragas del Eume and a children's playground, nature workshop, swimming pool...

name: hotel fraga do eume
title: (15613) hotel fraga do eume
description: Private area, but without the possibility of emptying. Very quiet, located in the entrance portal to the Fragas do Eume natural park. Request authorization to enter the nearby Fragas do Eume hotel or the Casa Peizas restaurant Within a hundred meters you have the hotel and the Casa Peizas restaurant, with local cuisine and bar. Number of excursions in the natural park, with river and beautiful deciduous forests. Also near Forgoselo, a good place to catch mushrooms. Less than five minutes a well-equipped sports climbing school with a variety of grades, from IV to 7c and another classic climbing area in the canyon with easy tracks of several lengths. It is closed with a chain, so that they open you have to call the hotel reception

title: (27004) Lugo - Acceso Complexo Deportivo Palomar
description: Sports area parking, quiet and close to park and river.

title: (27002) Lugo - Ronda República Argentina
description:
Motorhome area, 15 minutes walk from the city center.
Attention, in September the zone does not exist, since, for the festivities of the city, it is totally occupied by the carnies.

title: (27004) Lugo -
description: drinking fountain

title: (27004) Lugo - Paseo Fluvial
description: Quiet parking area near the Miño River, to share the parking of the vehicles.

title: (27004) Lugo - 15 Rúa Fermín Rivera
description: Parking next to the river, with a river club next to it and swimming pools, very quiet.

title: (27002) Lugo - 22 Avenida Ramón Ferreiro
description: The car parks, we sleep during the festivities of arde lucus, quiet place and close to the holidays.

title: (27004) Lugo - 22 Paseo Álvaro Cunqueiro
description: Parking at the edge of a quiet cul-de-sac. Right on the river. No residential area!

title: (15617) Monfero - DP-6902
description: Small dirt parking a bit sloping 1.5 km after the interpretation center, which also has another small parking and to which access is easier.  From there, you reach by a narrow road next to the river Eume, if you are facing another vehicle one will have to go back to a crossing zone.  Located next to the first suspension bridge (ideal for going to the monastery), next to a small building (closed) and public toilets (open, Turkish type).  There is no service, only parking and bivouac.  If it rains, the trees drip onto the vehicle and it becomes uncomfortable.  Pretty isolated (we were alone).

title: (27744) Riotorto - Unnamed Road
description: Open space next to the cemetery. Very quiet place with beautiful views.

title: (27002) Lugo - 44 Rúa Virxe da Esperanza
description: Place with a lot of parking, open area but very central, entertainment venues nearby, buses to the center. Near the Local Police. Very good site without problems.

title: (27240) Meira - 4 Lugar Irimia Alta
description: Source of River Miño. Picnic area with tables, bbqs and nice views. Flat parking area.

title: (27002) Lugo - 152 Rúa Montirón
description: Along the north-side of Rúa Montirón there are approximately 6 spaces that the municipality allows overnight parking.

title: (27274) Pol - 34 Lugar Rioxoan
description: A nice place to stop to rest and eat, quiet area although some traffic influx, the place is clean and in good condition

title: (27002) Lugo - 150 Rúa Montirón
description: Site authorized by the city council of Lugo, in front of the local police, in principle from June 2 to 19, the other area is closed. Very quiet site, with containers.

title: (27002) Lugo - Paseo dos Estudantes
description: Quiet and secure parking.

title: (15616) Vilarmaior - 9 Lugar Eirexa
description: Large fairly flat gravelled area, water point, very quiet green area

title: (27002) Lugo - Km 498 N-VI
description: Quiet public parking and there is a security guard in the pavilion

title: (27760) Lourenzá - 4 Estrada a Masma
description: Pk to the center of the town. 20 places. Containers, prat amb herba i portaries. eroski i llibreria al costat. Lloc molt silence and tranquility. Font d'aigua.

title: (27866) Viveiro - 7 Lugar O Naseiro
description: Meadow and group of Eucalyptus next to the Ermida do Remedios de Naseiro. Next to the river Landro. Collect waste to continue enjoying these spaces

title: (15339) Capela de San Antón - Unnamed Road
title_short: (15339) Capela de San Antón - Unnamed Road
description:
Picnic area with barbecue and tables in the middle of nature, a beautiful view of the surrounding hills, there are various marked hiking trails
Easy to reach for any vehicle
4g coverage

title: (15563) A Ponte do Norte -
description: Parking next to the Moeche pools. Possibility of bathing in the pools for a fee or the adjacent fluvial pool. Small picnic area with bar, play area and services during opening hours

title: (27879) - 11D Lugar O Loureiro
description: Esplanade in the middle of the forest with magnificent views, near the freida well with a 30m waterfall. At night we have been alone and a fox has even visited us :)

title: (27867) Landrove - 3 LU-540
description: Quiet moi place next to dunha igrexa, asphalted and leveled. There is a tap with potábel water, a container of lixo, a playground and a small sports court.

title: (27294) - 19 Lugar Cima de Vila
description: Free parking day and night, property of the gas station, free water filling service, perfect for large and small motorhomes very close to the city of Lugo (5 kms) they offer breakfast from 07:00 and good food service and cheap, terrace, as a rule I recommend refueling gasoline for the free services offered. It has gas refills and cepsa butane propane bottles. Quiet place for the night without noise. It has no shadow. EN "To Pontebranca"

title: (15563) San Xurxo de Moeche - 3 Camiño Fonte
title_short: (15563) San Xurxo de Moeche - 3 Camiño Fonte
description: Quiet place next to very nice cemetery. restaurant at 50 meters.

title: (27867) Viveiro - 1 Barrio Portochao
description: Very quiet place to sleep, eat, etc. Level, with tables and a small playground. There is also the beginning / end of a beautiful walk along the shore of the Landro river. On the other side, crossing the bridge, there is a fountain and a small jetty, comfortable for kayaks and for bathing in the river.

title: (27744) Riotorto - LU-P-4806
description: Asphalt parking with little incline, barbecue and tap with water (I suppose drinkable, I don't know). Capacity for about 10-15 vehicles. Very, very, very quiet, we have not stayed overnight, but I doubt there is any problem.

title: (15609) Pontedeume - DP-6902
description: Recreational area next to the Eume River in the Natural Park of Las Fragas del Eume. Here begin hiking and mountain biking routes there is water Potable

title: (27004) Chao -
description: Quiet place by the river. Better to spend the night here than in the middle of the city. For Transporter type campers, the rest would not fit for the last stretch of the road, but there are a couple of places in the picnic area that could even fit a medium AC. We've been alone and there doesn't seem to be much movement. JE3L

title: (15316) Coirós - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet esplanade next to the soccer field and the municipal swimming pool that only opens in summer. calm and quiet place to have a restful night. no services.

title: (15609) Pontedeume - DP-6902
description: Parking attached to the river. It has picnic area and barbecue. They usually park motorhomes etc ...

title: (27798) Vilamar - 8 Lugar Vilamar
description: Level place on completely flat cement. Surrounded by trees that cut the wind on bad days. Very calm. It has a playground, a couple of tables, a small shed and a lot of land, ideal for families and pets. It has drinking water and containers. There is a bar 200 meters away in the village. Please keep it clean.

title: (15609) Pontedeume - DP-6902
description: Nice quiet place by the river. Picnic benches and barbecue available. Protected area at night prohibited

title: (27850) Viveiro - 1 Camino Veiga -Magazos
description: Quiet parking with almost no traffic, no services, with some easily corrected unevenness. There is an access to a very nice river walk that goes along the shore of the Landro river.

title: (27245) - 33 Lugar Mestre
description: Rotorto picnic spot on the banks of the Eo. Overnight fine. About 1km dirt track signed off the main road. Fire place in a hut.

title: (27720) A Pontenova - Polígono Reparce Chousa Abaixo
title_short: (27720) A Pontenova - Polígono Reparce Chousa Abaixo
description: Picnic area with barbecue next to the river. Wide area to walk. next to the road you can park and spend the night, not camp.

title: (27720) A Puentenuevo -
description: Parking day and night in the center of town next to the cultural center. Next to supermarkets and shops, next to Del Río with a picnic area at 200m. Very quiet night, safe place with lighting.

title: (15563) San Ramon (Moeche) - 19 Carretera Feria
description: Self-service laundry "A Colada Agarimo" Hours every day from 08:00 to 22:00, 3 washing machines, 2 dryers, ironing area...

title: (27850) Viveiro - 9D Camiño Aceñas
description: Quiet parking next to the ITV with access to the coastal path. The lower area is quite flat but the upper area is uneven.

title: (27768) Trabada - 6 LU-132
description: Large mixed gravel and grass area next to small church with many stone picnic tables and stone barbecue points. Tap with fresh drinking water but no emptying. Stopped for long lunch only. Didn't overnight but this place is at least a kilometre away from the nearest house so overnight sleeping possible. Strong telephone signals.

title: (27245) Chao de Pousadoiro - 15T Lugar Chao
description: Free area

title: () A Pontenova - Camino Pista Antiguo Ferrocar
title_short: () A Pontenova - Camino Pista Antiguo Ferrocar
description: Motorhome area

title: (15806) Toques - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area with views of the waterfalls. A quiet area to eat or have a snack.

title: (27245) Chao de Pousadoiro - 20Z Lugar Chao
description:
Free parking, in a beautiful location by the river EO, with river plauge and canoe launching. ( For larger vans park in the main square carpark, before  the road to enter the recreativa, this has space for several larger vehicles. ) There's lovely mature trees and grass picnic area, with stone table's and benches and built-in barbeques for use; except in summer. Toilets, and cold open air showers. Small children's playground, and exercise machines. 

The campervan black water disposal is around the corner and up the hill beyond bar Horacio by the municipal buildings.

  The recreativa is on the edge of a small village with, 2 bars year round bars and a good restaurant/ bar Horacio that also has a basic convenience store attached. The hotel, bar, restaurant Miridor de Barcia is only 5 minutes walk down the other side of the river. There a a couple of small shops; small DIY store,  and lovely local baker with wood fired oven, on the far side of town before you go up the hill towards Meira . 

There is also a small medical centre and pharmacy a couple of doors down which is useful.  

There are lovely walks directly from the village in all directions.

  Please be respectful and leave no trace. Also ensure there's always space for locals to park, as differently abled people come to enjoy this beautiful place. 

Please be aware this is a community space and is used for the local Festa, during the last weekend of July, so you can't access the site.

Enjoy,  welcome to Ribiera do Piquin

title: (15806) Toques - Unnamed Road
description: Little corner of paradise lost in the middle of the Galician countryside. On the site of the Dolmen Forno dos Mouros, large grassy area (to be avoided in rainy weather) along a hiking trail. Access via a small, slightly sloping, but easily passable dirt road. More or less flat ground. Spent a night alone in the world without it seeming to be a problem.

title: (27850) Viveiro - 41 Avenida Ferrol
description: Large and free parking. The market day is celebrated in it and you can not park. Perfect to spend the night and visit the center 300 m.

title: (27728) A Pontenova - 1 Camiño do Antigo Ferrocarril
title_short: (27728) A Pontenova - 1 Camiño do Antigo Ferrocarril
description: A well-kept area with park tables and a fountain

title: (15813) A Porta - 10 Calle Santiago do Campo
title_short: (15813) A Porta - 10 Calle Santiago do Campo
description: Ideal parking to visit Sobrado and its monastery. Wide and flat. Municipal swimming pool next door (in summer).

title: (27869) Vivero - 1 Avenida de Juan Garcia Navia Castrillon
title_short: (27869) Vivero - 1 Avenida de Juan Garcia Navia Castrillon
description: Autolav Galicia laundry self service

address.street: 1 Avenida de Juan Garcia Navia Castrillon

title: (15388) Oza dos Ríos - 54 Lugar Agra
description: Picnic area next to a river very well arranged with tables, games area and barbecues. 1 or 2 seats. With a good van, we have passed a bridge too narrow for AC.

title: (15614) Pontedeume - 35 Avenida Ricardo Sánchez
description: Close to the hospital, park and estuary... quite level last with space for about 15 AC

title: (15560) San Sadurniño - 11 O Casal
description: New area and still not cemented but has water filling and emptying services. thank you to the town

title: (27850) Vivero - 14K Avenida de Galicia
description: Free parking to visit Viveiro. There are many squares and it is 2 minutes from the center.

title: (15600) Pontedeume - 10 Avenida Ricardo Sánchez
description: It is a very quiet sandy parking lot. It is not quite level, but it sleeps perfectly. Cafe next door and in the middle of the city.

title: (15813) A Pontepedra - 2 Lugar Pontepedra
description: Ideal place to have a good time in the shade of the big trees and next to the river. It has several wooden tables to eat and rest. Very close to Sobrado do Monxes.

title: (27850) Viveiro - 1 Calle San Roque
description: Apardoiro amplo e gratuito dun mirador onde you see all Viveiro, with tables, barbecues, playground and a restaurant.

title: (15621) Cabañas - 53 Avenida Arenal
description: Drinking water fountain along the way

title: (27850) Vivero - 6 Avenida Ramón Canosa
description: Large car park very close to the center 2 minutes and next to a large supermarket is in the Club Náutico has no services or the possibility of filling the waters, ample parking for sightseeing and shopping next

title: (15569) A Casilla - 2 AC-862
description: Fantastic place in the middle of nature for a food stop and fresh mountain water

title: (27163) Corgo - Autovía del Noroeste
description: Motorway rest area, 3 parking spaces for campers

title: (27861) - Avenida Luis Cebreiro
description: Vacant motorhome area, filled

title: (27163) O Corgo - Autovía del Noroeste
description: CEPSA gas station, fill and empty water and place for the night

title: (27861) Vivero - 22 Avenida Cantarrana
description: Self-service laundry, washing and drying

name: Camping Vivero
title: (27850) Camping Vivero
description: Camping in the town of Viveiro. There is an area for caravans and tents with natural shade of trees, and an area for motorhomes without shade but with large pitches (100 m2).

title: (27276) Baleira - CP-54-03
description: Leisure area with tables and next to a river suitable for swimming.

title: (15310) Curtis - 8 Lugar Centeas
description: Space for 4 Motorhomes. Has individual water taps BUT no water. Very small spaces. Tight squeeze for >7m. On main road so could be noisy at night.

title: (27850) Vivero - 24 Avenida Ramón Canosa
description: Laundry and Drying. Soap and softener included. Near the parking lot.

title: (27120) Castroverde - 27 Rúa Campo da Feira
description:
Area, free next to the municipal summer pool, next to a park with swings, tables, barbecues, 3 points of light inside the public bathrooms, it is next to the town.
Bars, restaurant, supermarket, laundry, health center.
Route to the viewpoint and the castle.
Fair and Octopus alternative Sundays.

title: (27861) Lugo - 50D Rúa Suasbarras
description: Day parking, beach next door. What I do not know is if you can sleep. The beach has a shower and Lavapiés, next to a bar called Galipizza to eat a little of everything and at good prices.

title: (15577) Neda - 9 Lugar Fervenza
description: Land parking near the Pazo Isabel II. Somewhat inclined and close to the road but quiet. No shadows and no services. People often park here to go see the Belelle waterfall (fervenza). The circular route from here is about 7.5 km.

title: (27879) Ventoselle - 17 Lugar Ventoselle
description: Small recreational area next to the Church, very quiet, a river runs very close, it has a fountain with drinking water (08-07-2021), tables and a grill to make a barbecue. The prao is flat in some area. Good land access very few meters.

title: (15806) Eirexe -
description:
Recreational area with tables, benches and litter bin. Next to the river.
The road passes but traffic is practically non-existent, very quiet.
From here there is a small circular route where you can see a waterfall and you can enjoy a good walk.

title: (27787) Foz - Unnamed Road
description: Perfect parking to visit the Basilica of San Martiño de Mondoñedo. The oldest cathedral in Spain, located in Foz.

title: (27002) Lugo - LU-P-2904
description: At the edge of a quiet and isolated road a staircase leads to a charming corner of the river. Very clean (we picked up 2 garbage bags).

title: (27863) Viveiro - Avenida Ramón Canosa
description: The parking of the local public swimming pool. next to the firefighters bombeiros

title: (27863) Cillero - LU-862
description:
Gas station with PROPANE CYLINDERS.
There is another Repsol gas station on the other side of town but they only have butane there. They told us that they had this one and so it was.

title: (27863) Viveiro - 100 Calle Ramon Canosa
description: Parking on the dock of the port, nice place for lunch

name: Camping municipal de Rio Xubia
title: (15597) Camping municipal de Rio Xubia
description: Ideal place in the middle of nature, river fishing options, hiking, mountain biking routes, motocross and many options. There are tables for picnic and plenty of space.

title: (15597) - 31 Lugar Gaiba
description: Pedroso Recreation Area (Narón). Ample parking with shade, next to the barbecue area and river with the possibility of bathing.

title: (27169) O Corgo - Autovía del Noroeste
description: Chamoso river beach in O Corgo. Green space to take a break, with tables and a bathroom area. Outside shower. Next to a restaurant-brasserie with a swimming pool.

title: (27234) Guntín - 10 Lugar Iglesia
description: Large car park with drinking water next to the church

title: (15337) Manón - CP-4401
description: Picnic area, with running water. It can be reached with a large motorhome

title: (15368) Ortigueira - 23 Lugar Trestemil
description: Small picnic area with a water tap and a barbecue. Several tables are available. In the shade to eat.

title: (15330) Ortigueira -
description: Flat quiet friendly corner near a mill

title: (27863) Viveiro - 6 Rúa Illa Gaveira
description: Cepsa service station where you can drain and refill water when filling with gasoline.

title: (27787) Foz - Unnamed Road
description: O pico da lebre viewpoint, from where you can see the town of Foz and the mouth of its estuary to the Cantabrian Sea.

title: (27788) Foz -
description: At the end of a forest track between a eucalyptus forest there is a corner where you can park one or two vans. The road is in good condition.

title: (27787) Foz - 4 Lugar Mourente
description: Recreational area with trees, tables and fountain.

title: (15340) Ortigueira - 16 Lugar Cereixal
description: Very quiet place, next to a paved road where cars hardly pass. 150m after crossing the river bridge there is a picnic area. It is a wonderful place where the Mera River divides in two, forming an island. Nature and tranquility guaranteed. possibility of walking route. Also ideal for a bike ride. Highly recommended.

title: (15330) Ortigueira - 2 Lugar Lagarea
description: Traditional open spout fountain For charging, park with the side where you have the water inlet facing the fountain

title: (27863) Viveiro - 45 Estrada da Area
description:
Parking both day and night.  Grass and trees area.  Very quiet and peaceful in nature.  There are no toilets, only the beach shower.  Services 2 min walk from the beach bar.  One of the best beaches in the area, a paradise with fine, clean sand and turquoise water.
 Restaurants and hotels around.  Supermarkets and others, 5 min away in Celeiro.  Surf beach (Esteiro) with surf school and waves of very good quality just 5 minutes by car.

title: (27788) Foz -
description: Location in front of the estuary, for 3/4 vehicles, very quiet, beautiful views, nearby public toilets, slightly sloping terrain

title: (15330) Ortigueira - 135 AC-862
description: Ortigueira self-service laundry. Washing and drying. To wait for the washing time, across the street you have very beautiful views .

title: (27877) Xove - 27 Terreno Parque Empresarial
description: Gas station with very low and convenient prices

title: (27861) Suegos - Unnamed Road
description:
Simple gravel parking lot of the Área singular cova da doncela.

Starting point for hikes to the caves. Further down the road there are also parts of an old port to visit (processed with jetties and viewing platforms)

5G reception given.

Access with our L2H2 without any problems. Very long vehicles may have trouble turning if the lot is full.

title: (27788) Foz - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area at Foz beach. Tables with or without shade, games for children, WC and cold shower. A priori we can swim but it was low tide and not sure that the water is very clean. View of Foz and its ria.

title: (15337) Manón - 1 Lugar Barbeita
description: Parking by the river. They call it the sports center because there is a grass soccer field and a basketball and soccer field (all a bit neglected) plus an area for tables and a playground. No noise at night. The access road is narrow but you can enter with AC. Of course, at the end of the tour you will have a few blocks on the roof.

title: (27861) O Vicedo - 6 Lugar a Brela
description: Abrela beach is a parking on the beach among the pines with picnic area, and public toilets, quiet, beautiful tourist area !! The beach is very nice and very safe for children, restaurant "Choco" is a super nice guy, seafood and fish, the food is very good and cheap

title: (15330) Ortigueira - 5 Calle Alameda
description: Perfect parking lot to sleep in, bars next to a good beer and very friendly and welcoming people, totally recommendable mixed parking lot. only suitable up to 6.70m.

title: (15816) Boimorto - 1 Lugar Ponte
description: I add parking for motorhomes, authorized by management, but the road is very busy.

title: () Foz - 6 Rúa do Ru Curbeiro
description: There is a wide grassy area where motorhomes park, looking directly over the estuary. The small services unit allows you to drive over the drain for grey waste.

title: (27780) Foz - 35 Rúa Antón Vilar Ponte
description:
Self-service laundry 800 meters from the camper area.
Three washing machines of and three dryers.
Very spacious and clean laundry room.

title: (15330) Ortigueira - 3 Rúa do Malecón
description: The Ortigueira town hall has provided booths with bathrooms and hot showers completely free of charge. They have a plug. They are very clean.
